description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6ohk0","text":"This sequencing protocol is intended to directly follow and use the PCR products of the protocol:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2b3vj","text":"\"Environmental DNA (eDNA) 12S Metabarcoding PCR Protocol (with Platinum SuperFi II Taq)\" which amplifies the hypervariable region of the mitochondrial DNA 12S rRNA gene in eukaryotes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4qk32","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"65cj4","text":"This protocol creates a pooled library which is then size selected using a Blue Pippin or Pippin HT to select for the vertebrate/fish band (~350 bp) and remove the co-amplified bacterial band (~435 bp).  Then the pooled product is sequenced on an Illumina MiSeq v2 in a 2x250bp paired end format.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

{"blocks":[{"key":"5efvh","text":"Summary\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aljus","text":"This sequencing protocol is intended to directly follow and use the PCR products of the protocol:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ebod5","text":"\"Environmental DNA (eDNA) 12S Metabarcoding PCR Protocol (with Platinum SuperFi II Taq)\" which amplifies the hypervariable region of the mitochondrial DNA 12S rRNA gene in eukaryotes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bppbi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2o3ij","text":"The primers (MiFish-U-F \u0026 MiFish-U-R) used in the PCR protocol were developed by Miya et al., 2015 for metabarcoding environmental DNA (eDNA) from fishes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7u2at","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5j51k","text":"This work was supported by the David and Lucile Packard Foundation, and NASA award 80NSSC21M0032 and NOAA award NA22NOS0120184 in support of the CeNCOOS MBON.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3qpc7","text":"Method description and rationale\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":32}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"54bto","text":"This protocol creates a pooled library which is then size selected using a Blue Pippin or Pippin HT to select for the vertebrate/fish band (~350 bp) and remove the co-amplified bacterial band (~435 bp).  Then the pooled product is sequenced on an Illumina MiSeq v2 in a 2x250bp paired end format.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"65ssv","text":"Spatial coverage and environment(s) of relevance\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":48}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"27vad","text":"This protocol has been used to sequence extracted DNA from filtered sea water samples taken from marine coastal stations off the western coast of North America (primarily off of California).\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4e5s7","text":"sea water [ENVO:00002149]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bd4rb","text":"http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/ENVO_00002149","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":44}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"0AB84F37835111EE86950A58A9FEAC02","url":"http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/ENVO_00002149"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7rvih","text":"PERSONNEL REQUIRED\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cpnf7","text":"1 technician","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ko8s","text":"Safety\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"173d8","text":"Identify hazards associated with the procedure and specify protective equipment and safety training required to safely execute the procedure","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5esc1","text":"Training requirements\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9lfcl","text":"In the following SOP, please use the exact names of equipment as noted in the table above.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b36m0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4cf9i","text":"Provide a step-by-step description of the protocol. The identification of difficult steps in the protocol and the provision of recommendations for the execution of those steps are encouraged.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bmep0","text":"Follow steps in the protocol \"Environmental DNA (eDNA) 12S Metabarcoding PCR Protocol (with Platinum SuperFi II Taq)\" through secondary amplification and QC of 12S PCR product.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2ik2c","text":"None","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fsipo","text":"None","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"buj1j","text":"None","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d708g","text":"None","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cjsip","text":"1. After the pooled library was QC’d, the library was size selected with either a Blue Pippin or Pippin HT to select for the vertebrate/fish band (~350 bp) and remove the co-amplified bacterial band (~435 bp).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"atpgr","text":"2. The library pools were QC’d and quantified using a combination of Qubit dsDNA HS, Agilent 4200 TapeStation HS DNA1000 and Invitrogen Collibri Library Quantification qPCR assays.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"sd53","text":"1. After secondary PCR, products were run through Invitrogen SequalPrep Normalization Plate (ThermoFisher Scientific) using manufacturer’s protocol to create pooled library.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f9mq7","text":"2. After size selection, the pooled library was QC’d again to confirm selection of the correct band and new amplicon concentrations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6llt9","text":"The pooled product for the genetic locus was loaded on a standard MiSeq v2 flow cell and sequenced in a 2x250bp paired end format using a v2 500-cycle MiSeq reagent cartridge.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ko6s","text":"2. The MiSeq run was performed with a 20% PhiX spike added.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"27v9k","text":"3. Primers complementary to the Fluidigm CS1 & CS2 oligomers were added to appropriate wells of the reagent cartridge to server as sequencing and index read primers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aon2n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8f71t","text":"12S Sequencing primers (5’ to 3’ direction):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f4di5","text":"FL1-CS1(read1) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"efbhf","text":"A+CA+CTG+ACGACATGGTTCTACA","type":"atomic","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":25}],"data":{}},{"key":"3hueu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2snds","text":"FL1-CS2(read2) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6e2fl","text":"T+AC+GGT+AGCAGAGACTTGGTCT","type":"atomic","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":25}],"data":{}},{"key":"3bb0c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2i1s","text":"FL2-CS1rc ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c3gdb","text":"T+GT+AG+AACCATGTCGTCAGTGT","type":"atomic","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":25}],"data":{}},{"key":"18a91","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"76rdv","text":"FL2-CS2rc(index) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d3f85","text":"A+GAC+CA+AGTCTCTGCTACCGTA","type":"atomic","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":25}],"data":{}},{"key":"34et3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bdhai","text":"
